docs.title: Welcome to MkDocs
docs.text: For full documentation visit mkdocs.org.

docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

Title: User preference

Type object Required No Additional properties Any type allowed Property Pattern Type Deprecated Definition Title/Description + id No string No - User preference id + maximum-monthly-rent No number No - User's maximum rent + roommate No int No - User's roommate preference (maximum number of roommates) + bathroom No enum (of string) No - User's bathroom preference + laundry No enum (of string) No - User's laundry preference + doorman No enum (of string) No - User's doorman preference + elevator No enum (of boolean or string) No - User's elevator preference + gym No enum (of boolean or string) No - User's gym preference + pet No enum (of string) No - User's pet preference + furnish No enum (of string) No - User's furnish preference

docs.title: 1. Property User preference > id
docs.text:
Type string Required Yes Format uuid

Description: User preference id

docs.title: 2. Property User preference > maximum-monthly-rent
docs.text:
Type number Required Yes Format currency

Description: User's maximum rent

docs.title: 3. Property User preference > roommate
docs.text:
Type int Required Yes

Description: User's roommate preference (maximum number of roommates)

docs.title: 4. Property User preference > bathroom
docs.text:
Type enum (of string) Required Yes

Description: User's bathroom preference

Must be one of: * "exclusive" * "shared-1" * "shared-2" * "shared-3"

docs.title: 5. Property User preference > laundry
docs.text:
Type enum (of string) Required Yes

Description: User's laundry preference

Must be one of: * "in-unit" * "in-building" * "offsite"

docs.title: 6. Property User preference > doorman
docs.text:
Type enum (of string) Required Yes

Description: User's doorman preference

Must be one of: * "in-person" * "virtual" * "no-preference"

docs.title: 7. Property User preference > elevator
docs.text:
Type enum (of boolean or string) Required Yes

Description: User's elevator preference

Must be one of: * true * "no-preference"

docs.title: 8. Property User preference > gym
docs.text:
Type enum (of boolean or string) Required Yes

Description: User's gym preference

Must be one of: * true * "no-preference"

docs.title: 9. Property User preference > pet
docs.text:
Type enum (of string) Required Yes

Description: User's pet preference

Must be one of: * "any" * "cat" * "dog" * "no-pets"

docs.title: 10. Property User preference > furnish
docs.text:
Type enum (of string) Required Yes

Description: User's furnish preference

Must be one of: * "furnished" * "unfurnished"

docs.title: 3. Property User > preference
docs.text:
Title: User preference

Type object Required No Additional properties Any type allowed Defined in user-preference.yaml Property Pattern Type Deprecated Definition Title/Description + id No string No - User preference id + maximum-monthly-rent No number No - User's maximum rent + roommate No int No - User's roommate preference (maximum number of roommates) + bathroom No enum (of string) No - User's bathroom preference + laundry No enum (of string) No - User's laundry preference + doorman No enum (of string) No - User's doorman preference + elevator No enum (of boolean or string) No - User's elevator preference + gym No enum (of boolean or string) No - User's gym preference + pet No enum (of string) No - User's pet preference + furnish No enum (of string) No - User's furnish preference

docs.title: 3.1. Property User > preference > id
docs.text:
Type string Required Yes Format uuid

Description: User preference id

docs.title: 3.2. Property User > preference > maximum-monthly-rent
docs.text:
Type number Required Yes Format currency

Description: User's maximum rent

docs.title: 3.3. Property User > preference > roommate
docs.text:
Type int Required Yes

Description: User's roommate preference (maximum number of roommates)

docs.title: 3.4. Property User > preference > bathroom
docs.text:
Type enum (of string) Required Yes

Description: User's bathroom preference

Must be one of: * "exclusive" * "shared-1" * "shared-2" * "shared-3"

docs.title: 3.5. Property User > preference > laundry
docs.text:
Type enum (of string) Required Yes

Description: User's laundry preference

Must be one of: * "in-unit" * "in-building" * "offsite"

docs.title: 3.6. Property User > preference > doorman
docs.text:
Type enum (of string) Required Yes

Description: User's doorman preference

Must be one of: * "in-person" * "virtual" * "no-preference"

docs.title: 3.7. Property User > preference > elevator
docs.text:
Type enum (of boolean or string) Required Yes

Description: User's elevator preference

Must be one of: * true * "no-preference"

docs.title: 3.8. Property User > preference > gym
docs.text:
Type enum (of boolean or string) Required Yes

Description: User's gym preference

Must be one of: * true * "no-preference"

docs.title: 3.9. Property User > preference > pet
docs.text:
Type enum (of string) Required Yes

Description: User's pet preference

Must be one of: * "any" * "cat" * "dog" * "no-pets"

docs.title: 3.10. Property User > preference > furnish
docs.text:
Type enum (of string) Required Yes

Description: User's furnish preference

Must be one of: * "furnished" * "unfurnished"
